results.title: Haematopoietic effects of Angelica sinensis root cap polysaccharides against lisinopril-induced anaemia in albino rats
results.text_hl: Haematopoietic effects of Angelica sinensis root cap polysaccharides against @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Anemia_Hemolytic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000743 @@@anaemia@@@ in albino rats

citations.NLM: Younas F, Aslam B, Muhammad F, Mohsin M, Raza A, Faisal MN, Hassan SU, Majeed W. Haematopoietic effects of Angelica sinensis root cap polysaccharides against lisinopril-induced anaemia in albino rats Pharm Biol. 2017 Dec;55(1):108-113. PMID: 27925507
citations.BibTeX: @article{27925507, title={Haematopoietic effects of Angelica sinensis root cap polysaccharides against lisinopril-induced anaemia in albino rats}, author={Younas F and Aslam B and Muhammad F and Mohsin M and Raza A and Faisal MN and Hassan SU and Majeed W}, journal={Pharm Biol}, volume={55}, number={1}, pages={108-113}}

results.title: An Unusual Cause of Anaemia of Chronic Disease: Lisinopril-Induced Chronic Inflammatory State
results.text_hl: Medications, in this case @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, can be implicated in similar pathophysiological processes.

citations.NLM: Eyre T, Van-Hamel-Parsons V, Wang LM, Hughes KA, Littlewood TJ. An Unusual Cause of Anaemia of Chronic Disease: Lisinopril-Induced Chronic Inflammatory State Case Rep Hematol. 2011;2011():939080. PMID: 22937315
citations.BibTeX: @article{22937315, title={An Unusual Cause of Anaemia of Chronic Disease: Lisinopril-Induced Chronic Inflammatory State}, author={Eyre T and Van-Hamel-Parsons V and Wang LM and Hughes KA and Littlewood TJ}, journal={Case Rep Hematol}, volume={2011}, pages={939080}}

results.title: Post-marketing surveillance of lisinopril in general practice in the UK.
results.text_hl: Conversely, @DISEASE_Headache @DISEASE_MESH:D006261 @@@headaches@@@, @DISEASE_Pallor @DISEASE_MESH:D010167 @@@pallor@@@ and @DISEASE_Flushing @DISEASE_MESH:D005483 @@@flushing@@@, @DISEASE_Tang_Hsi_Ryu_syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:C536897 @@@oedema@@@ and @DISEASE_Heart_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D006331 @@@palpitations@@@ caused more frequent withdrawals from @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@. @<m>DISEASE_Anemia_Hemolytic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000743 @@@Anaemia@@@ was more often encountered on @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@nifedipine@@@ treatment than on @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@.

citations.NLM: Fallowfield JM, Blenkinsopp J, Raza A, Fowkes AG, Higgins TJ, Bridgman KM. Post-marketing surveillance of lisinopril in general practice in the UK. Br J Clin Pract. 1993 Nov-Dec;47(6):296-304. PMID: 8117550
citations.BibTeX: @article{8117550, title={Post-marketing surveillance of lisinopril in general practice in the UK.}, author={Fallowfield JM and Blenkinsopp J and Raza A and Fowkes AG and Higgins TJ and Bridgman KM}, journal={Br J Clin Pract}, volume={47}, number={6}, pages={296-304}}

results.title: Progression of renal failure with anaemia and multiple effects of angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor in rats with renal mass reduction.
results.text_hl: However, beneficial effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ on @<m>DISEASE_Anemia_Hemolytic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000743 @@@anaemia@@@ was not observed.

citations.NLM: Yatsu T, Sanagi M, Fujimori A, Tomura Y, Hayashi K, Tanahashi M, Inagaki O. Progression of renal failure with anaemia and multiple effects of angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor in rats with renal mass reduction. Pharmacol Res. 2003 Mar;47(3):243-52. PMID: 12591020
citations.BibTeX: @article{12591020, title={Progression of renal failure with anaemia and multiple effects of angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor in rats with renal mass reduction.}, author={Yatsu T and Sanagi M and Fujimori A and Tomura Y and Hayashi K and Tanahashi M and Inagaki O}, journal={Pharmacol Res}, volume={47}, number={3}, pages={243-52}}
